posts.post_title: FS: Bill Clymer PSA 3 Carolina Bright -SOLD
posts.post_content:
For sale is a nice example of Bill Clymer with the difficult Carolina Bright back graded PSA 3.  If interested please send me a PM or contact me at [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url].  Preferred payment is PPFF.  The price below includes delivery.

Clymer Carolina Bright PSA 3 - $1125
